name: Walgreens Seniors Day
description: 20% off regularly priced items on first Tuesday of month for 55+
fullDescription: Walgreens offers seniors aged 55+ a 20% discount on regularly priced items the first Tuesday of each month. Must be a myWalgreens member (free to join).
whatTheyOffer:
- 20% off regularly priced items
- Available first Tuesday of each month
- Excludes prescriptions, alcohol, tobacco, dairy, and select items
- Must be myWalgreens member (free)
- Ages 55 and older eligible
howToGetIt:
1. Join myWalgreens rewards program (free)
2. Visit Walgreens on first Tuesday of month
3. Show myWalgreens membership at checkout
4. Discount applied in-store and online
5. Ages 55 and older eligible
keywords: Walgreens, senior discount, 55+, first Tuesday, pharmacy, retail, 20% off, myWalgreens
